plurals.name: saved_multiple
plurals.item: %2$s and other %1$d file has been saved to %3$s.
%2$s and other %1$d files has been saved to %3$s.

resources.string: Tap to toggle whether to show…
Bridge have no read / write storage permission, please grant it in settings.
A bridge that connects share to internal storage, work profile apps or other apps.

Save file to Download/Bridge.
To screenshots, they will be saved to Pictures/Screenshots instead.

Some app can\'t receive shared item properly, you can share to Bridge first and Bridge will forward shared item to those app.
You should select which app will show in forwarding first.
No apps can perform this action.
You should select which app will show in forwarding first in Bridge.

It seems that you\'ve enabled work profile, to transfer file between the main user and the work profile, you should install Bridge and enable functions in that user first.

Usually to most apps, you just need to tap \"Switch to work (personal)\" from the Android system. But to some poorly-designed apps, you should tap \"Forward\" and tap \"Switch to work (personal)\" from Bridge first, then you can save or share.

\"Poorly-designed apps\" above means:
The app can\'t handle content uri, acts like the app shows \"file not found\" or just closed.
The app will share file uri (file path) to other apps, other apps may not have permission to read the file.
Sharing from poor-designed app, you should share to \"Forwarding\" from Bridge first.
This app did not send file.

Cache forwarding file to <font face="monospace">Download/Bridge</font> instead of <font face="monospace">Android/data/moe.shizuku.bridge</font> to solve the problem that the receiving app may not able to access the file in the latter.
